attributes.action: Explain why massive funding has been brough by Arnold Schwarzenegger to introduce hydrogen powered vehicles to California, including filling stations, but no such funding has taken place in the UK even though the PM is desperate to bring down emissions?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is the PM scared of spending the millions needed to bring hydrogen technology to the UK?
If he isn't will he please explain why we are lagging behind...AGAIN!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
